channel.title: Please help--Downloading
channel.description: How do i download a server, like on media fire. I want to put the server i have, up onto media fire or mega upload, but i dont know how, or what folders i put in. Do i do the source and client? Please help. :)

item.title: Please help--Downloading
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

well… compressing the whole thing helps.

right click on the main folder of your server (the folder you click that opens the directory with all the server files in it)

if you have winrar, just choose the option “add to ###.rar”

the #### being the name of the folder

Read full topic
